ComicInfo.Summary:
War! Witness the beginning of the end as Avalon and her companions face off against the combined might of the Red Clan and the Templar Order in the first half of an epic two-issue battle! Do our heroes have what it takes to prevail?
ContentsGates of ChaosBroken Oaths, Broken Warriors*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Gabriel Rodriguez & Lovern Kindzierski | 1 | B | Cover B | Gabriel Rodriguez & Lovern Kindzierski | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Gabriel Rodriguez | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 21:29:45. [CVDB671083]
